list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a day of religious observance and abstinence from work, kept by Jewish people from Friday evening to Saturday evening, and by most Christians on Sunday.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we observe the Sabbath as God has commanded
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi quan sát ngày Sa-bát vì Chúa đã chỉ huy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a supposed annual midnight meeting of witches with the Devil.
